transcript:
Customer: Hello
Helllo
Executive: Hello yes sir yeah good afternoon kaise ho aap?
Customer: Achcha hai na?
Executive: Haan okay sir maine aapko us morning mein call kiya tha sir.
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Haan aaj hi morning maine aaj aapko call kiya tha saamne se hi maine aapko call kiya hai sir.
Customer: Jitna bhi number hai woh yahan ka jo hai local sab team theek hai woh toh phone uthata nahi hai sabse pehle.
Executive: Kahan ka team sir?
Customer: Ranchi ka.
Executive: IndiaMART.
Customer: Haan IndiaMART ka mere jo office mein aake package bataya jiske through liye hain uske upar jo senior se jo baat hua sara number hai 10 din se phone kar rahe hain koi receive nahi kar raha hai.
Executive: Aapko mujhe call kar lena chahie tha main receive kar leti hu sir call aapko toh maine apna number de rakha hai.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Ji bataiye sir.
Customer: Ek bhi data nahi aa raha hai 15-20 din ho gaya hai theek hai.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Aur data hi nahi aa raha hai.
Customer: Bola gaya tha Ranchi ki buylead kam post ho rahi hai.
Customer: Kya bole?
Executive: Main keh rahi hu sir sirf Ranchi ki buylead bahut kam post ho rahi hai.
Customer: Toh bhi kya matlab ki pura month beet gaya aur abhi tak ek data bhi nahi aaya kya karan kya hai bataiye us samay toh bola ki aapko Ranchi ka data milega 140 milega month mein nahi milega tab boliyega.
Toh nahi bolna chahie na ki jo bhi hai jo bhi sachchai bolna chahie.
Executive: Sir is cheez ko toh maine aapko day one mein hi clear kar diya tha jab meri aapse pehli call hui thi.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Us din hi maine aapko call pe hi bol diya tha sir ki jab inquiry aayegi tabhi sir woh aapko show ho jaati hai theek hai aisa kuch bhi like ki saamne se aapko woh 110% ki Ranchi ki per day aapko buylead milegi aisa kuch bhi nahi hota.
Customer: Nahi toh aap jaise package lene ke baad bole hain theek hai.
Executive: Haan ji.
Customer: Lekin usse pehle jo commitment kiya tha puchiye apna jo jo aata hai buyer aapka yahan pe theek hai usse puchiye ga.
Jo marketing jo dekhta hai usse puchiye ga ki haan commitment kiye hain ya nahi kiye hain.
Aisa rehta toh hum kyun lete?
Executive: Sahi baat hai sir koi bhi agar kisi ko bhi agar buyleads wagera agar chahie hongi agar saamne se cheez boli gayi sir aapke paas kuch bhi written documents hai iske regarding ki aapko yeh sari cheezon ka commitment kiya gaya hai kuch bhi written document hai ki aapko itna like per day woh month buylead wagera sari cheezein.
Customer: Yeh toh bol yeh toh nahi nahi bataya hai yeh commitment kya rahega isse aap bhi aap hi se hum puch sakte hai ki aap aap samjhane aaye toh kya denge aapko koi proof thodi deta hai koi.
Executive: Sir but ek baat woh dikha raha tha apna system pe dikha raha tha dekhiye 140 ko hum log dete hain month mein theek hai hum log wohi samjhe hain aur kya rakhe isse proof bataiye ki woh commitment kiya hai.
Executive: Sir dekhiye main woh jo 140 jo bole honge na woh aapko buylead ka bole honge weekly aapko jo buylead milti hai woh 17-17 ka balance aapko milta hai yeh cheez unhone boli ki aapko Ranchi location ki hum 140 buylead denge.
Customer: Haan hum usko first first mein hi bol diye the ki humko sirf Ranchi ka lead chahie bolke aapko sir kahin ka bhi lead chahie jahan boliyega wahan ka lead mil jaayega hum bola theek hai tab Ranchi mein lead kitna denge bola 140 commitment kar rahe hain toh 140 denge 140 agar kam hua theek hai do chaar 10 kam hua toh agla month mein hum adjust kar denge hum bole theek hai.
Customer: Aur yahan toh pata chal raha hai ki 40 gaya ki chaar go bhi nahi ho raha hai.
Executive: Nahi sir aap bilkul sahi keh rahe ho Ranchi ki buylead bahut hi kam post hui hai.
Executive: Same location ki agar aap demand kar rahe ho.
Customer: Aisa nahi hai mam aur aur jagah hum dekhte hain aur aadmi diya hua hai IndiaMART aisa nahi hai.
Customer: Office bula rahe hain hum 10 din se phone kar rahe hain shuru se hi jab se yeh package hum liye hain sir kal aa rahe hain parso aa rahe hain abhi tak koi bhi office tak nahi aaya.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Sir dekhiye.
Executive: Sir toh phir unse aapki baat chit ho rahi hai na woh aane ka keh rahe hain na.
Customer: Nahi phone first mein toh call uthaya woh theek hai sir hum kahin bahar mein hain shaadi mein aaye hue hain do din ke baad aayenge chaar din ke baad hum theek hai chaar din ke baad phir call hi uthana band kar diya hai.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Marketing jo aaya woh bhi calling band kar kar diya uska jo manager ho gaya toh HR hai woh bhi call uthana band kar diya hai.
Executive: Sir.
Customer: Toh hum kya samjhenge IndiaMART fake hai bataiye.
Executive: Kya bol rahe hain sir?
Customer: Hum kya samjhe jab koi call hi nahi utha raha toh IndiaMART fake hai kya samjhe bataiye.
Executive: Nahi sir is cheez ko toh main bilkul bhi sir dekhiye main aapse sir isliye toh yeh cheez puch rahi hu ki agar woh aapko written pe koi bhi like proposal wagera agar kuch bhi aapko share karte hain na sir agar usme koi.
Customer: Dikhaya system mein hi dikhaya ki hum log ka jo bhi commitment rehta hai system pe rehta hai system mein hai ki nahi ki ek mahina mein 140 denge bataiye.
Executive: Toh wohi sir agar woh aapko proposal wagera mein kuch mention hota na toh phir main usi time like usko usko.
Customer: Proposal mein mention kahan rahega koi letter toh likh ke nahi deta na usse proposal ke hum likh ke de rahe hain.
Executive: Nahi sir bahut sare clients ko like hota hai na ki like mention karke log proposal bana kar bhi share karte hain.
Customer: Hum log IndiaMART pe toh vishwas hi tha vishwas hai isliye hai theek hai pura India achcha se run kar raha hai uske baad bhi koi nahi rakhta naya naya rehta usme hum log proposal rakh lete haan aap likh ke dijiye.
Executive: Sahi baat hai bilkul.
Executive: Toh wohi cheez hai sir theek hai main abhi main khud bhi sir dekh rahi hu ki Ranchi location ki bahut hi kam like bahut Dhanbad Jharkhand ki 16 ghante pehle post hui hai toh aap usko receive nahi karenge Dhanpur Jharkhand ki hui hai Daltaganj Jharkhand ki hui hai yeh sare location se sir ho rahi hai but agar aap Ranchi ka bolo sir toh main aapko abhi bhi clear kar Ranchi kam se kam Jharkhand ka bhi toh data dijiye aap.
Executive: Sir Jharkhand ka toh hua hai sir civil contractor service mein appeal karte hain.
Customer: Aap kahin Ranchi ka bhi data nahi kam se kam Jharkhand ka dijiye theek hai.
Executive: Sir.
Customer: Dekhte hain Jharkhand pura Jharkhand ka bhi data dijiye abhi.
Executive: Sir ek baar aap na Amit sir aap na ek baar IndiaMART open kar lijiye aur ek baar video meeting mein aapke sath rakh rahi hu aap aa jaiye sir video meeting par aa jaiye.
Executive: Theek hai.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan haan.
Executive: Main aapke sath video meeting abhi ka schedule kar rahi hu aap aa jaiye okay.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Hmm theek hai main aapko share kar rahi hu chaliye ek minute.
summary:
Concerns:

- Not receiving buyleads as per commitment.

- No one is answering calls from IndiaMART team.

- No one from IndiaMART visited their office.



Resolution:

- Executive acknowledged the issue with Ranchi buyleads.

- Executive offered a video meeting to resolve issue.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will schedule a video meeting.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, commitment, support, follow up
